home.title: Confman
home.head: Centralize your app's parameters with Confman
home.text1: Le principe de Confman est simple, offrir un dépôt centralisé pour tous les paramètres de vos applications pour chacun des environnements. Vous pouvez ensuite vous interfacer à Confman via les plugins offerts. Pour le moment nous avons un plugin maven et une API Java (bientôt suivront une intéraction via Gradle, ligne de commande, Grunt JS)
home.text2: Le but de Confman est de vous aider dans la gestion des modifications des paramètres sur chacun de vos environnements, sur chacune des instances des applications tout en répondant aux exigences de développement et de la production. Confman est une application à la croisée du développement et de l'opérationel.

env.title: Environment
env.description: You can use several environments to offer different context for developers, testers, the final users... For example you can have development, staging, production...
env.name: environment

error.required: Your form is not submitted : code and label are required
error.used: The code  is already in use

info.profile: You can limit the population of users who can modify elements linked to an environment. For example you maybe want to prevent the modifications on production which can be made by dev team.

soft.title: Software Suite
soft.description: In a complex context you have often a set of of software
soft.name: software suite

error.required: Your form is not submitted : code and label are required
error.used: The code  is already in use

info.type.instance: If you use the same instance for different environment you have to duplicate it because the configuration could be different for each environment
info.type.parameter: A paramater can be specific for an instance or an application

psearch.title: Configurations
psearch.description: Search configuration and watch parameters values

pcreate.title: Configurations
pcreate.info: A new configuration is created from an application version number. Confman display a form with the last known values (last version tracking for the actual application version number). You can change every parameters values but you won't be able to change them after the saving (expect for SNAPSHOT version). We choose this policy because all the changes have to be followed.
